name: GOSO
overview:
GOSO provides engaging Facebook applications that boast a simple message – your Facebook page will thank you, your fans will love you. GOSOâ€™s Social Intelligence platform is a perfect pair when coupled with these intuitive applications. The company which has thousands of satisfied customers has also developed custom solutions for top brands such as Ford, Harley Davidson, Nissan and successful movie actor, Jon Heder, most known for playing the title character of the comedy film Napoleon Dynamite.

In 2010, GOSO was selected as an Official Honoree for the Automotive category in The 14th Annual Webby Awards as well as named as a finalist in three categories for the 8th Annual American Business Awards.
